scenesbefore.speaker: Frosty
text: Hey Chilly, what do you say we settle a town here?

scenesbefore.speaker: Chilly
text: Well it's not a bad spot.
There's a lot of snow around, hills to roll down...
But it's so bright here without trees!

scenesbefore.speaker: Frosty
text: Ah I know! We'll make sunglasses!

scenesbefore.speaker: Chilly_hesitant
text: Er, but what are we going to make them from?

scenesbefore.speaker: Frosty
text: Our friends from Lensville and Frametown should help with that.
With their ingredients, we can make our first factory!

scenesafter.speaker: Chilly
text: Wow, that was a lot easier than I expected...

scenesafter.speaker: Frosty_glasses
text: Of course! We can do practically anything
